word: Let us do our best to bring about unity.  I am in a position where I cannot change the past experience if I would; for the Lord has led me and has given me such evidence of His power in every advance movement of our work, that I have assurance, made doubly sure, as [to] every position we now hold as truth.  We cannot distrust such manifestations of the Lord's power in defining what is truth.  I am charged that we are to hold the beginning of our confidence firm unto the end.  We now need clearly to define what is truth, and let not the enemy steal a march on us.
